edited_stories.edited_story_text: Our family get togethers were always the best. Everyone would gather around the table to enjoy a meal together. Grandma would always help the littles ones. After we ate it was nap time for the men and sometimes the babies. While the men napped the women would sit around and tell stories and talk about old times with the younger girls.
